Weymouth_Town.WBZ (AM):
WBZ (1030 kHz) is a Class A clear channel AM radio station licensed to Boston, Massachusetts. Formerly owned by Westinghouse Broadcasting and CBS Radio, the station is owned and operated by iHeartMedia.
WBZ transmits using the HD Radio digital format, and its programming is carried on the HD2 digital subchannel of 107.9 WXKS-FM. WBZ's studios and offices are on Soldiers Field Road in the Allston neighborhood of Boston, and its transmitter site is in Hull, Massachusetts.
